alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:01PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL CLERMONT AND WEST CENTRAL BROWN COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Batavia, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Amelia, Mount Orab, Bethel, Williamsburg, Batavia, Hamersville, Lindale, Greenbush, East Fork State Park, Nicholsville, Bantam, New Hope and Locust Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
